00023 template <typename Point>
00024 class bccpPred
00025 {
00026   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::size_type size_type;
00027   typedef std::pair<size_type, size_type> Edge;
00028   typedef typename std::vector<WSP<Point> >::iterator WspIter;
00029   typedef std::pair<Edge, double> WEdge;
00030 
00031 public:
00032 
00033   bccpPred()
00034   {
00035   };
00036 
00037   bool operator()(const WspIter &a, const WspIter &b)
00038   {
00039     return (a->get_bccp_dist() < b->get_bccp_dist());
00040   }
00041   bool operator()(const WSP<Point> &a, const WSP<Point> &b)
00042   {
00043   return (a.get_bccp_dist() < b.get_bccp_dist());
00044   };
00045   bool operator()(WEdge &a, WEdge &b)
00046   {
00047     return a.second < b.second;
00048   }
00049 };

00051 template<typename Point>
00052 class calcBccpPred
00053 {
00054 public:
00055   double *minBccp;
00056   int THold;
00057   
00058 
00059   bool operator()(WSP<Point> &a)
00060   {
00061     if(a.size() < THold)
00062       {
00063         a.bccp();
00064         return true;
00065       }
00066     if(a.get_bccp_dist() < *minBccp)
00067       {
00068         if(a.get_bccp_dist() < *minBccp)
00069           *minBccp = a.get_bccp_dist();
00070       }
00071     return false;
00072   }
00073 };

00075 template <typename Point>
00076 class unionFindPred
00077 {
00078   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::size_type size_type;
00079   typedef std::pair<size_type, size_type> Edge;
00080   typedef typename std::vector<WSP<Point> >::iterator WspIter;
00081   typedef std::pair<Edge, double> WEdge;
00082   typedef comp_quad_tree_node<Point>* CqPtr;
00083   
00084 public:
00085   int_partition &Uf;
00086   comp_quad_tree<Point> &cqtree;
00087   std::vector<Point> &Points;
00088 
00089   unionFindPred(int_partition &uf, comp_quad_tree<Point> &cq, std::vector<Point> &P) : Uf(uf), cqtree(cq), Points(P)
00090   {
00091   };
00092   
00093   bool operator()(WSP<Point> &a)
00094   {
00095     size_type first, second;
00096     Point *f,*s,*z;
00097     
00098     z = &(*(Points.begin()));    
00099     if(a.bccp_done())
00100       {
00101         f = (Point*) (a.first);
00102         s = (Point*) (a.second);
00103         first = f-z;
00104         second = s-z;
00105       }
00106     else
00107       {
00108         first = (((CqPtr) a.first)->low)-Points.begin();
00109         second =(((CqPtr) a.second)->low)-Points.begin();
00110       }
00111     return (Uf.find(first) != Uf.find(second));
00112   };
00113 
00114 };

00116 template <typename Point>
00117 class boxLengthPred
00118 {
00119   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::size_type size_type;
00120   typedef std::pair<size_type, size_type> Edge;
00121   typedef typename std::vector<WSP<Point> >::iterator WspIter;
00122   typedef std::pair<Edge, double> WEdge;
00123 public:
00124   bool operator()(const WSP<Point> &a, const WSP<Point> &b)
00125   {
00126     return (a.length() < b.length());
00127   }
00128 
00129   bool operator()(const WSP<Point> *a, const WSP<Point> *b)
00130   {
00131     return (a->length() < b->length());
00132   }
00133 };

00135 template <typename Point>
00136 class boxDistPredMin
00137 {
00138   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::size_type size_type;
00139   typedef std::pair<size_type, size_type> Edge;
00140   typedef typename std::vector<WSP<Point> >::iterator WspIter;
00141   typedef typename std::vector<WSP<Point>*>::iterator WspPIter;
00142   typedef std::pair<Edge, double> WEdge;
00143 
00144 public:
00145   
00146   //size_type pivot;
00147   double minBccp;
00148 
00149   boxDistPredMin()
00150   {
00151   };
00152 
00153   bool operator()(const WspIter &a, const WspIter &b)
00154   {
00155     double minBccp1 = dist_sq_between_quad_boxes((*a).first, (*a).second);
00156     double minBccp2 = dist_sq_between_quad_boxes((*b).first, (*b).second);
00157     return minBccp1 < minBccp2;
00158   };
00159   bool operator()(const WspIter *a, const WspIter *b)
00160   {
00161     double minBccp1 = dist_sq_between_quad_boxes((*a)->first, (*a)->second);
00162     double minBccp2 = dist_sq_between_quad_boxes((*b)->first, (*b)->second);
00163     return minBccp1 < minBccp2;
00164   };
00165   bool operator()(WSP<Point> &a)
00166   {
00167     return (a.get_bccp_dist() < minBccp);
00168   };
00169 
00170   bool operator()(WSP<Point> *a)
00171   {
00172     double maxBccp = max_dist_sq_between_quad_boxes(a->first, a->second);
00173     return (maxBccp < minBccp);
00174   };
00175 };

00208 class bccpDistPred
00209 {

00211   typedef std::pair<size_type, size_type> Edge;
00212   typedef typename std::vector<WSP<Point> >::iterator WspIter;
00213   typedef std::pair<Edge, double> WEdge;
00214

00218   
00219   bccpDistPred()
00220   {
00221   };

00223   bool operator()(WSP<Point> &a)
00224   {
00225     return (a.bccp().first < maxBccp);
00226   };
